text: ME TOO! I was so mad. The back of the game case made me think it was a fighter game...also the name doesn't sound very rpg-ish, and so I never bought it, thinking they had turned the series into a fighting genre, or that it was simply a spin-off. How I regret that choice.

text: I share your sentiment for Shimomura and Sakuraba, but I like those other composers as well.  I love how each artist has this unique and characteristic style about them.

text:
Same here :)
